segments.text: Excuse me . I want to pay the bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please wait till your name is called .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK.Your bill includes the doctor's fee and the cost for a 3 - day supply of medicine . It comes to one hundred yuan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Here is the receipt . The dispensary is over there ... By the way , will this be covered by your insurance from work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'll e paying for myself , but I have private medical insurance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In that case , I'll give you a certificate , so you can get it reimbursed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't lose this receipt , because insurance companies are very difficult about helping when they don't have the right paperwork .
segments.speaker: S1
